html:
By Swastika Mukhopadhyay and Monika Asthana
NewsRise
MUMBAI (Feb 25) -- Events scheduled on Friday:

NEW DELHI: National Company Law Appellate Tribunal to hear Amazon’s case challenging the Competition Commission of India’s order in Amazon-Future Group deal.

NEW DELHI: 10:00 am: Health Minister Mansukh Mandaviya, Junior Chemicals and Fertilizers Minister Bhagwanth Khuba, Department of Chemicals and Petrochemicals Secretary Arti Ahuja, Joint Secretary (Petrochemicals) Kashi Nath Jha at FICCI event.

10:30 am: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Defence Minister Rajnath Singh at post-budget webinar on defence sector.

11:00 am: Ministry of Electronics and IT MyGov Chief Executive Officer Abhishek Singh, Google Research India Director Manish Gupta at FICCI webinar on artificial intelligence technology for India.

11:00 am: India Ratings and Research webinar on FY23 outlook for non-banking finance companies and housing finance companies.

4:30 pm: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, Niti Aayog Chief Executive Officer Amitabh Kant at Asia Economic Dialogue 2022.

MUMBAI: 5:00 pm: RBI to release weekly foreign exchange data.

MUMBAI: RBI to set underwriting fees for INR230 billion weekly bond auction.

MUMBAI: India to sell federal bonds worth INR230 billion.

MUMBAI: RBI to conduct 14-day variable rate reverse repo auction worth INR7 trillion.

EARNINGS: Rain Industries.
- By Swastika Mukhopadhyay and Monika Asthana; swastika.mukhopadhyay@newsrise.org; +91-33-6813 3333
- Edited by Gurdev Singh Virk
